name: The Main Program (WEB version)
description:
WEB-version of the game  created for Go Godot 3 Classic 2022 Game Jam. It represents the evolution of robots. A new model of assistant droid has just arrived to Steam Factory. But there is a small bug in his AI program and he can not identify his main task. Explore the factory and help him to find his own purpose.

All models, art and music here - my own work.
Some of the sound effects were taken from Creative Commons site.

P.S. I recommend to check Win version (https://phantawalker.itch.io/main-program-evo), it has a little bit better graphics and sound. In otherways this is the same version. Good luck!)
